name: Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup
briefdescription: This easy chicken noodle soup recipe made with veggies and leftover chicken is warm, comforting, and ready to ladle into bowls in just over 30 minutes.

ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste

instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and celery and cook until just tender, about 5 minutes.
Add chicken broth, vegetable broth, chicken, egg noodles, carrots, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Stir to combine and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.

comments.comment: I used this recipe as my base, then I added a package of frozen soup veggies with Tyson's Grilled & Ready Oven Roasted Diced Chicken Breast. I followed the instructions for the soup veggies and served it with crackers. It was especially enjoyed by the extremely picky eaters in the household.
